title: Gravity is my enemy
brief_description: A documentary on painter, Mark Hicks, a man essentially without nerve or muscle function below the neck. Examines his skill, his images, his life and others’ perception of him.
description: A documentary on painter, Mark Hicks, a man essentially without nerve or muscle function below the neck. Examines his skill, his images, his life and others’ perception of him.
